page.title: 06Eccles Precinct 2
page.content:
We wanted to find out more about what people thought of the shopping precinct itself.
25% wanted to see more clothes shops and butchers. 22% wanted more supermarkets 16% wanted more stationers 5% wanted more baby shops and a Marks & Spencers 2% wanted to see more sports shops
The peoples' favourite shop was Morrisons Supermarket. This was favoured by 58%.
We then asked about peoples' dislikes: In fact, 54% thought that the precinct was alright as it was. The complaints we did find were about litter (the main dislike), children riding bikes, the lack of toilets and the pigeons.
